items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect navy cardigan!
items.body: Very pretty, scalloped edges and arms. Comfy weight, not too thick or thin. The fit is right on. Very nice to dress up or down. Great quality material. Read more
items.author: Daniel Langlois

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely, nice fabric, fits well, pretty color
items.body: I just bought 3x "army" green scalloped sweater. The fabric is nice and soft and the fit is spot on. I do not generally wear my sweaters buttoned so I can't say how it would look buttoned closed but seems like it would be fine. There were no tears and no odor. The color is pretty not really reminiscent of Army, which to me is more dull. The test will be when the sweater has to be washed which I have yet to do. The scallop designs on the bottom edge and sleeve edges are attractive and feminine. The sweater is light for all types of weather including indoor AC. Read more
items.author: Fred

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks fine dressed up or dressed down.
items.body: So soft and lovely. Perfect for adding to a short-sleeved dress when it's chilly outside. Perfect for layering. Looks fine dressed up or dressed down. Read more
items.author: Anni Welborne

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars So Pretty and Nice Quality
items.body: I love this cardigan! It is very nice, substantial material. Not too heavy or thin for fall weather. The scallop detail is quite pretty and the button holes are not too big for the buttons so they don’t slip in and out easily. I took one start off because it is shorter than I expected. The photos show it coming down to mid-hip. But it barely gets to the bottom of my waist. However, I did order my regular size after reading the reviews that said I should order one size up. I did that on purpose because I have been losing weight and I want it to fit me for as long as possible. So I knew it would run a tad small. But I still didn’t expect it to be that short. I will still wear it because it is very pretty and looks fine on. Read more
items.author: Sweetheart75

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Unexpected Quality
items.body: The quality of this sweater is much better than expected at this price point. The fabric is a nice silky texture, medium weight and fits really nicely. And for once, the sleeves hit at my wrist where they are supposed to instead of halfway down my hands. Someone said it was too short, but I didn't find that at all. I am 5'4" mid hip. The detail and stitching is done nicely, and there are no threads, loose buttons, or snags. Honestly, I have paid $60 for sweaters from Macys that weren't as nice as this one. I did order a size up because I like to layer it and I know it will shrink some no matter how careful I am with it. Overall, very pleased and will be ordering a couple more for wearing to work. Read more
items.author: audone

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not a sweater for taller ladies
items.body: This is a light sweater, don't expect something for winter temps. It's cute, the scalloped edges are nice. The color was on point. The reason for the 3 stars is because the garment is really short. Best for a cropped look for a taller woman or mid hip length for shorter women. Read more
items.author: Jtap

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for Any Occasion!
items.body: True to size! Love the style. Very happy with it…wear it all the time! Liked it so much I bought my daughter one for her birthday. Nice to find more plus sized women’s’ clothes here on Amazon. Used to purchase a lot from Roamans,but their shipping charges are getting rediculous! Read more
items.author: Darlene M. Calderone

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Scallop edge cardigan
items.body: Fits well. Washes beautifully. Nice layering piece. One of my favorites. Color true as pictured. Read more
items.author: Joan B

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, Light Blue, Red, Wine Red, Khaki, White, Royal Blue, Army Green, Black, Dark Gray, Navy Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.
